name: Css3-buttons
body: ## Flat CSS3 Buttons Flat buttons built from css3. #### Default Button In order to use the default button add the classes `btn` and `default` to any appropriate element ```html Button ``` #### Button Sizes You can use the the classes `lg`, `sm`, `xs` for large,small and extra small respectively ```html Button Button Button ``` #### Round Buttons For round buttons simply add the class `rd` to the button element ```html Button ```
